word_mean: 衰退：机能的自行改变，如因老衰而发生的改变
熵：热力学系统中不能用来作功的那部分热或能。一切(自动与不可逆的)自然过程都会引起熵的增加
〔精神〕熵：精神分析上指全神贯注于某一客体而不能转移的精神能力
熵，系统中无序或无效能状态的度量。熵在信息系统中作为事物不确定性的表征。

sentence.Network_en: In the business world, entropy rules.
sentence.Network_cn: 在商业世界中，无序状态主宰一切。

sentence.Network_en: No matter how much of a misanthrope you are there is such a thing as entropy and it will catch up with you sooner or later.
sentence.Network_cn: 不论你是一个多么不愿意与人交往的人，你迟早会被成千上百万条的信息包围。

sentence.Network_en: The entropy density is constant ahead of the shock.
sentence.Network_cn: 冲击波前方的熵密度是恒定的.

list.abs: 条件熵（conditional entropy）H[y|x]是描述在已知x取值的情况下，再获知y所能获得的信息量大小期望。H[x,y]=H[x]+H.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from en- 'inside' + Greek tropē 'transformation'

entry.def: Entropy is a state of disorder, confusion, and disorganization.

means.word_mean: 1. (communication theory) a numerical measure of the uncertainty of an outcome;

sentences.sentence: "the signal contained thousands of bits of information"

means.word_mean: 2. (thermodynamics) a thermodynamic quantity representing the amount of energy in a system that is no longer available for doing mechanical work;

sentences.sentence: "entropy increases as matter and energy in the universe degrade to an ultimate state of inert uniformity"
